game.name: Bow Man
game.shortDescription: 활 남자는 정확하게 정밀도와 전략을 사용하여 대상 또는 상대에 화살표를 촬영해야하는 아케이드 게임이다. 촬영 마스터가 될 결투 또는 전체 대상에서 원수와 경쟁.
game.shortDescriptionEn: All you have to do is kill the monsters. Try to kill as many monsters as possible to make the highest score possible.

reviewHighlights.text: A simple arena shooter. On the plus side there is the ability to improve the character. On the downside, there is no online rating table.
not very bad and indie game, atmospheric 2d shooter, killing time with some kind of hard phonk will do. Unfortunately, there are few upgrades, I hope...
